org.gservlet

Class AbstractListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gservlet.AbstractListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContextAttributeListener, AbstractContextListener, AbstractRequestAttributeListener, AbstractRequestListener, AbstractSessionActivationListener, AbstractSessionAttributeListener, AbstractSessionBindingListener, AbstractSessionIdListener, AbstractSessionListener

    public abstract class AbstractListener
extends Object
implements EventListener
    Abstract base class inherited by all the listeners classes
    Author:
    Mamadou Lamine Ba
